CustomField.description:
-Manage billings to be captured & identify inconsistencies -Ensure all billings are completed in a timely manner -Update accounts receivable database with the new invoice generated -Ensure all invoices are generated in a timely manner (turnaround time-1 day) -Check the validity of the accounts code (turnaround time-1 day)
Purchasing cycle management: Issue PO, physical verify, DO, match PO to invoice, payment
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
-Manage billings to be captured & identify inconsistencies -Ensure all billings are completed in a timely manner -Update accounts receivable database with the new invoice generated -Ensure all invoices are generated in a timely manner (turnaround time-1 day) -Check the validity of the accounts code (turnaround time-1 day)
Purchasing cycle management: Issue PO, physical verify, DO, match PO to invoice, payment
CustomField.label: Billing and Daily Operations
